Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 36th overall pick, by Pontiac in 1971...
Injured on 6/1/1972 with a Bruised Foot, out for 4 days...
Injured on 4/2/1975 with a Bruised Finger, out for 2 days...
Injured on 5/16/1975 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 5/22/1976, off Richard Rummel (CC)...
Injured on 4/24/1977 with a Bruised Heel, out for 6 days...
Hit first career homerun on 6/29/1977, off Daron Hamlin (LP)...
Traded from Pontiac to New Jersey on 5/12/1979 (Going to NJ: C B. Ingalls. Going to PON: P M. Feliu)...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Catcher in 1979...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Boston (FBA) on 5/15/1980...
